transcript:
voice was again heard at the door. 
"Directly!" 
Meanwhile, Pe" tya, having found and seized the sabers in the outer room, with the delight boys feel at the sight of a military elder broth- er, and forgetting that it was unbecoming for the girls to see men undressed, opened the bed- room door. 
"Is this your saber?" he shouted. 
The girls sprang aside. Denfsov hid his hairy legs under the blanket, looking with a scared face at his comrade for help. The door, having let Ptya in, closed again
